snippet: The African Union Mission in Somalia said that the two men, who were working for aid agencies, were rescued in an operation near Somalia’s border with Kenya.
abstract: James Kiarie Gichoi and Daniel Njuguna, Kenyan aid workers who were abducted by the Shabab militant group in 2011, are rescued by Kenyan troops who are part of a peacekeeping mission in Somalia.
lead_paragraph: The African Union Mission in Somalia said that the two men, who were working for aid agencies, were rescued in an operation near Somalia’s border with Kenya.

headline.main: 2 Kenyans Kidnapped in Somalia in 2011 Are Found Alive
